narrative:
There are no covered animals currently housed at this facility. According to the owner, the facility is not and does
not plan to conduct any covered activities. The owner stated he will send in a letter to cancel the facility's
registration. The letter should be emailed to ACWest@aphis.usda.gov and/or mailed  to 
                      USDA APHIS Animal Care
                      2150 Centre Ave., Bldg B, MS 3W11
                      Fort Collins, CO 80526
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the Owner.
Additional Inspectors
Schnell Michael, Veterinary Medical Officer
